titles: The hope of health wherin is conteined a goodlie regimente of life: as medicine, good diet and the goodlie vertues of sonderie herbes, doen by Philip Moore.
author: Moore, Philip, fl. 1564-1573.
notes: Includes "A table for. xxx. yeres to come" printed in red and black.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
